record.title: MORNING BUSINESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, there will now be a period of morning business until 3:30 p.m. with Senators permitted to speak therein up to 10 minutes each, with the time equally divided and controlled by the two leaders or their designees.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I suggest the absence of a quorum and ask the time be charged equally against both the majority and minority time.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered. The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
